de.jannlab.misc

Class DoubleTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jannlab.misc.DoubleTools

  • public final class DoubleTools
extends Object
    This class provides some methods for handling arrays of doubles.

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte
